body.p: Mr Garnett dissents from the issue of the IFRS because it both establishes a measurement principle for non‑controlling interests with which he disagrees, and permits an exception to that principle. Whilst the exception permits the accounting that he considers appropriate, the use of alternative accounting methods reduces the comparability of financial statements.
